Key Match Events: Brooks Lee hit a two-RBI single in the sixth inning
Carlos Santana hit a two-run homer in the seventh inning
Lee had a bases-loaded triple down the right field line
Spencer Steer hit an RBI triple in the fourth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Minnesota Twins maintained a 2 1/2-game lead over Detroit and Seattle for the last AL wild card spot
Twins manager Rocco Baldelli said the pitching did a good job and the bats broke through
Miscellaneous Highlights: Twins scored eight times in the sixth and seventh innings
Cole Sands and Jorge Alcala pitched scoreless innings
Twins started with David Festa who gave up two runs, three hits, and three walks in 3 2/3 innings
